VERY OOC: Uh, oh. X-Box. Now I GOTTA do it. Advertisement: Get a Game Cube.=
 It'll pay off in the long run. They may not have Devil May Cry, and they m=
ay not have Halo, but they have several okay games, and then it's Super Sma=
sh Bros. Melee's turn to come out! YES! Nintendo has been around the longes=
t, their system the SNES had all of the greatest RPG's of all time, and the=
ir systems are the only place to find Resident Evil! Besides that, all of t=
he best wrestling games are, and always will be on Nintendo's consoles. Ser=
iously! I know I may not persuade very many of you, but the important part =
is I tried. I will not bash the 2 systems I do not prefer, however, because=
 that would be acting like the immature game companies that started that cr=
ap, Atari and Intellivision, and really, all of the systems have their good=
 points! In fact, I only want Game Cube for the wrestling and fighting game=
s, and stuff similar to those! Well, that was just my 2 cents, and if I was=
 offered any of the game systems for free, I'd take it! Bye bye for now!...=


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: KSLawdogg@... 
  To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, November 30, 2001 8:41 PM
  Subject: OOC


 =
 I was going to start the Round 2 of IGL...but I got an X-Box so I'm busy.
=


  -L. Unitron
